website_summaries.verdict: Whether you're recovering from an injury, or just need a little extra TLC, your feet will thank you for choosing these supportive sandals.
pros: Springy, cushy, and supremely comfortable, these sandals have been known to alleviate pain and discomfort caused by a variety of orthopedic issues
Envelopes feet in a soft yet supportive cocoon
Supportive arches and an impact absorbing footbed are specially designed to protect feet recovering from injury
cons: Certainly not unattractive, but the unique design isn't appealing to all

customer_reviews.title: Love My OOFOS
customer_reviews.text: I love my new OOFOS! My first pair of OOFOS and I ordered these black flip-flops. Read lots of Amazon customer reviews before deciding to order a pair. I'm so happy with my OOFOS. I wear a women's size 9"-9.5" in most shoes. My feet measure exactly 10". I was debating between the women's size 9" or 10". Based on very helpful customer reviews I went with the size 9". They fit perfect! Not too small and not too large. So I decided to include a picture with my review to hopefully help someone out. These OOFOS are so soft, have good arch support, and I feel like I'm walking on cushions of fluffy clouds!
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne H.

customer_reviews.title: These are the BEST!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am a 7 1/2 I bought a 7 and an 8 the 7 fit perfectly!!! I LOVE these!!!! I bought them as a recovery shoe after exercise, they are like walking on clouds after a long hard run!!! I love them so much I wear them all the time now!!!!! They are holding up great for being a rubber material. They helped my plantar fasciitis. Treat yourself!!!
customer_reviews.author: Fit at 40

customer_reviews.title: Good fit, but...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, but there is too much support under my instep. Usually flip flops do not have enough or it is in the wrong position. With these the arch support is where it is supposed to be but puts too much pressure on the arch for me. Perhaps my arches have fallen a bit over the years. Love the looks and the color though - periwinkle I think (blue).
customer_reviews.author: N. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Love these shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes. Aside from helping my aching feet, they also provide outstanding customer service. I didn't know what size so I ordered two different sized with the intent to return the wrong one. Well...I waited to long to return via Amazon. I decided to take a chance and reach out to the Oofas site directly. Well, guess what, they exchanged my wrong size. I only had to pay for the shipping of the shoe back to them (which was better than loosing out in total). Not only did I find a new brand of shoe my feet love, I also found a company I love! Kudos Oofas!
customer_reviews.author: K. LEHMANMARQUEZ

customer_reviews.title: Got them for after runs, ended up wearing them regularly.
customer_reviews.text: I never wore flip flops, could barely walk in them and made my toes sore after I tried. After a few days I was wearing these all day long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and ok in water
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable but a little too much like walking on marshmallows.
customer_reviews.author: Ethyl

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE THESE! I am training for my 2nd half ...
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE THESE! I am training for my 2nd half marathon and my only regret is I didn't get these sooner!! They are like walking on clouds, fit perfectly as expected, such a nice material. I am going to order for my husband who is training as well! They are water proof too! win win all around!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Just Great!
customer_reviews.text: My feet feel good in these! Like walking on a cloud!
customer_reviews.author: 3Catzzz

customer_reviews.title: These shoes are awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: These flip flops are comfortable and great for problem feet.
customer_reviews.author: moe

customer_reviews.title: Blew out the flip-flop
customer_reviews.text: The Flip-Flop was great while it lasted. They fit just as expected and were very comfortable. They lasted 3 months then the toe divider blew out. Not much of a flip flop now. There is no warranty after 3 months. I probably wore them an average of 5 hrs a week. I've never broken a flip flop in my 50 yrs of life until now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The most COMFORTABLE, perfect sandals for PLANTAR FASCIITIS
customer_reviews.text: I ended up getting three pairs in different colors because they are soooooooo comfortable and I have no foot pain while wearing them. I am a marathon runner that started having plantar fasciitis pain in my left foot (I have high arches and narrow feet), and these are the most comfortable shoes I own. If I could wear them everyday, I would. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: HK2006

customer_reviews.title: They Don't Come Wide Enough
customer_reviews.text: I wear a 4E width. I tried on several OOFOS products and couldn't wear one. My foot couldn't even get in to some of the products. Why can't the manufacturer make a strap across the top so customers can adjust the width? Or just make some in wider widths; you're missing out on business. When I tried on a pair that was way too large I could tell that the brand is good and that the comfort would be off the charts. Too bad I can't buy some. :( I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Smart Consumer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but wouldn't last long.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but wouldn't last long. Rarely used them and the toe strap broke after a few months. Very disappointed. For the price paid, the Manufacturer should offer lifetime warranty no questions asked.
customer_reviews.author: J>A.

customer_reviews.title: The most comfortable sandal ever and helps me recover from long runs
customer_reviews.text: I loooooove my oofos! Thursday basically walked all day. Friday I ran 8 miles at the track and today I ran 12 miles. After my run. The top of my foot was starting to hurt. So, I put on my offos. I love them. Now my foot pain went away. It’s like walking on marchmellows. My feet are always so happy in these shoes. There’s something about the way this shoe supports my arches and it really helps me recover from a hard run. Thank you. I just bought the shoes. Not the best looking pair, but I love them so much that I don’t even care.
customer_reviews.author: Gladys

customer_reviews.title: Best Flip Flops to be Had
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter told me about Oofas and am I ever glad. They are the most comfortable flip flops I've ever worn. They are made of a rubber-like substance that pads your foot while walking. I could wear them all day and my feet would feel fine. They may cost a little more than the trendy shoes, but these are by far the best.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Brody

customer_reviews.title: After 1+ year, still amazingly soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are the best sandals all around. If you're a runner, these things are just the greatest things to walk on for recovery. It's like walking on a thick yoga mat. Even after a year, they are holding up surprisingly well. Probably just as long as my old crocs, but way more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallow shoes!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I can't say enough good things about these shoes. I bought a pair of blue ones at a running store, due to pain in the ball of my foot. They were the only shoes I could wear comfortably this summer. I bought another pair from Amazon in black. I will say that even though the size was the same as the blue ones, they seem slightly smaller. I just ordered another style, the slide, in hopes they will allow my to walk my dog without pain. I call them my marshmallow shoes. Great if you have foot pain due to weight bearing problems, or if you are a runner and need recovery shoes post race. Great price on Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Krista L McAtee

customer_reviews.title: Made my back hurt
customer_reviews.text: Got these because I'm a distance runner and my feet get sore from all the miles and needed a break. They felt great at first so I wore them a lot for a couple of days and then my back started hurting. I realized that every time I wore the shoes, my back hurt. The high mid-sole of the shoe changed my gait which can be damaging to the rest of your body. Sadly, I can't wear them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: snyder

customer_reviews.title: Good for runners and those with plantar fasciitis!
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my feet especially my plantar fasciitis. These are billed as recovery shoes. They were recommended to me to relieve foot stress are long runs. I got them as a Christmas gift and my foot pain has depleted dramatically. I’ll update my review after I do a few long runs and find out how my feet feel in the shoes.
customer_reviews.author: La Trice Washington

customer_reviews.title: WONDERFUL support but tapers in front causing tripping
customer_reviews.text: First off, I LOVE the support it provides for my foot with plantar fasciitis. It is very very comfortable. I wear a woman's size 8, and the front of the flip flop causes me to trip. I feel like I need to take a razor and take a 1/2" off. It tapers in a weird way and catches the path while walking. That's why I take off two stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mary. E.

customer_reviews.title: Ouch, these hurt the front of my foot
customer_reviews.text: These hurt my feet in new places that have never hurt before. My heel felt better but my arch and front top of my feet are in immense pain after 1 hour of wearing. I keep using these flip flops when I go to the pool area as they are my only pair right now, about once a week for 2 hours. My feet always hurt wearing them. They do not work for everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Moreno

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING AND MIRACULOUS!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a really constant and painful lower back pain. Walking from my living room to the adjacent kitchen was hardly possible. Bought two pair of Oofos -- black and gray. Two days into using a pair, my back pain was almost gone and I now have none, no pain left. I put them on first thing out of bed and walk in them everywhere. Totally recommend them! GET THEM!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They a so comfy and great support. Bought after much research as I am ...
customer_reviews.text: OMG! Will be buying more! They a so comfy and great support. Bought after much research as I am recovering from a partial knee replacement, broken ankle in 3 places with plates and screws, dislocated kneecap and deep quadricep tear, need support and comfort as getting tired of tennis shoes, these area Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Fine in terms of overall comfort
customer_reviews.text: Fine in terms of overall comfort. However, in 8 months of VERY occasional wearing, the connection between the top straps and the base (the part between the toes) snapped. Upon examination, there is NO apparent reinforcement of that critical junction...just a thin strip of the same soft, pliable material that the entire sandal appears to be made of. Absolutely inexcusable to be faulty in the most basic level of construction. Will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Janine Honey

customer_reviews.title: I have bad arthritis of my right foot and this is the ...
customer_reviews.text: I have bad arthritis of my right foot and this is the only flip flop that is comfortable for me. I can walk all day in them and never have any pain.
customer_reviews.author: sylvana

customer_reviews.title: WARNING: Pink Ribbon Printed on Shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love my oofos; however I just got a new pair, to replace my worn pair that I have had for years and was surprised and irritated to see a pink ribbon printed on the side of it. It makes me angry each time I see or think of it because I was not told it would be on there, I did not have the option to not have it, and it screams of virtue signaling and leftist activism, even if supporting breast cancer is a good thing. By the way, I am a cancer "survivor". I would have given these shoes 5 stars but because of the pink ribbon it only gets 4.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa M.

customer_reviews.title: BEST SANDALS I'VE EVER OWNED!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oofos's are by far the best sandals I've ever owned. Incredibly comfortable and after a week of wearing them my feet and back felt better. GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: WOW they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: I never wear flip flops, but a friend told me about these....WOW they are wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: David F. Schlemmer

customer_reviews.title: SAFETY ISSUE!
customer_reviews.text: Very slick soles when wet. Slip, slide away on slick surfaces when wet! Need to redesign the sole to grip when wet. Rib?
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love,love,love my OOFOS I have several pairs. I wear them 90% of the time. They have helped takeost of my foot pain away. Thank you for helping me keep ip with my grandchildren! My daughter in-law loves them also and said hers were a blessing during pregnancy.
customer_reviews.author: linda a zemaitis

product_meta.title: OOFOS - Unisex OOriginal - Post Run Sports Recovery Thong Sandal
product_meta.description: Our most popular shoe soothes and reinvigorates your feet after a workout, so you'll be ready to do it again tomorrow. With OOfoam technology, the patented footbed design absorbs impact, cradles your arches and allows you to move naturally. Your feet will know the difference.
feature_bullets: OOfoam Recovery Technology absorbs 37% more impact than traditional footwear foam
Patented footbed cradles your arches to reduce stress on sore feet, ankles, knees and lower back
Biomechanically designed to allow natural motion
